places.name: Flat Iron Kings Cross

places.address: 2 Bagley Walk, London N1C 4PQ, United Kingdom

places.name: Nonos
places.address: 112 Judd St, London WC1H 9NT, United Kingdom

places.address: 5 Stable St, London N1C 4AB, United Kingdom
places.review_excerpt: The restaurant, ambiance, and service were all truly wonderful, and the food was very delicious. However, the only downside is that the portion sizes are quite small considering the price. I also found it surprising that

places.name: The Lighterman
places.address: 3 Granary Square, London N1C 4BH, United Kingdom

places.address: 1 Granary Square, London N1C 4AA, United Kingdom

places.address: 49, Coal Drops Yard, London N1C 4DQ, United Kingdom

places.address: Harry's Kings Cross, 3 King's Blvd, London N1C 4BU, United Kingdom

places.address: 1 Granary Square, London N1C 4AA, United Kingdom

places.name: German Gymnasium
places.address: 1 King's Blvd, London N1C 4BU, United Kingdom
places.review_excerpt: German Gymnasium is worth visiting even just for its architecture. The building is beautiful and grand - impressive without feeling intimidating. We visited so as to try their Oktoberfest menu, and the experience was a b

places.address: 6 Pancras Sq, London N1C 4AG, United Kingdom

places.address: Pancras Rd, London N1C 4TB, United Kingdom

places.name: Barrafina Coal Drops Yard
places.address: 27 Coal Drops Yard, London N1C 4AB, United Kingdom
places.review_excerpt: I popped into Barrafina recently for lunch with an old friend, and it was such a nice little reunion. I used to come here at least once a month when I lived nearby, so I was really happy to find that the food and service

places.name: FIRIN
places.address: 140 York Wy, London N1 0AX, United Kingdom
places.review_excerpt: Cosy, friendly Turkish restaurant on Yorkway near Granary Square in King's Cross. Friendly efficient service and very tasty kebap/stews and pide. Turkish wines as well which is a nice option for something different. Well

places.review_excerpt: We came for an early dinner and really enjoyed the experience. The restaurant was not busy yet, so the seating felt very comfortable and the cosy décor made it a relaxing place to settle in. The food was delicious with

places.name: BAO Kings Cross
places.address: Unit 2, 4 Pancras Sq, London N1C 4DP, United Kingdom
places.review_excerpt: First time going to BAO (King’s Cross branch) and it didn’t disappoint! I went a couple of days after my birthdag, and the staff made it very special. We got the beef steak rice, egg yolk dish - delicious and perfectly c

places.review_excerpt: The first time I went to the restaurant, I felt welcomed, the set up was great and the staff were really friendly. I tried the mushrooms mezzaluna with celeriac broth, loved it but the broth was a bit salty. The staff we

places.name: Fatto a Mano King's Cross
places.address: Unit 1, 3 Pancras Sq, London N1C 4AG, United Kingdom
places.review_excerpt: Absolutely loved this place! Just tried this Italian pizzeria for the first time and it was such a great experience. The pizza was so good — fresh, full of flavour, and perfectly cooked. The starter was amazing as well!

news.title: The Best TV Shows of 2025
news.description: From ‘The Rehearsal’ and ‘King of the Hill’ to ‘Pluribus’ and ‘Andor,’ the year’s best shows told stories that felt like they were reaching through our screens, pointing at the world and urging us to open our eyes to the fraught moment.

news.title: Aging: 3-5 cups of coffee a day may add extra 5 years to life span
news.description: Scientists have found the sweet spot of drinking coffee daily that could lengthen the life span of people with major mental illness and help slow down biological aging by five years.

news.title: Queensland report on puberty blockers might not see the light of day
news.description: A Queensland government-ordered report on the use of puberty blockers and hormone therapies in the treatment of transgender adolescents is due on Sunday but might never be publicly released.
